citation: Proclamation under the Children, Young Persons and Their Families Amendment Act 2013 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Children, Young Persons and Their Families Amendment Act 2013

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Children, Young Persons and Their Families Amendment Act 2013 fix 1 October 2016 as the day on which sections 10 , 38 , 40 and 44 of that Act commence.

19 September 2016

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

J. PETRUSMA

Minister for Human Services

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 28 September 2016

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Health and Human Services.
